description: Phase 1 Embedding Optimization Complete: Removed code_context from embeddings (88% of text), added fixtures/ to .julieignore. Rationale: BGE-Small truncates at 512 tokens anyway, code_context was adding noise not signal. Expected 75-88% faster embedding generation. Code_context still in DB for FTS5 text search. Philosophy shift to RAG best practices: one semantic concept per embedding.
